inclusion.criterion: Pre-pregnancy tests for normal thyroid function (FT3, FT4, TSH)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: First pregnancy between the ages of 18 to 35 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Early screening (1-12 weeks of pregnancy) initial screening TPOAb positive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: thyroid function FT3, FT4 normal, TSH<4.78mIU/L
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Combined with other autoimmune diseases (such as systemic lupus erythematosus, etc.)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, but symptoms improved with Levothyroxine treatment and thyroid profile is mostly within normal range.
